title: Unicoratha Women's Crystal Rhinestone Low Heel Slip on Evening Party Sheepskin Sandals Shoes
features: MATERIAL: The Upper is made of Comfortable Cashmere Microfiber with Rhinestone Decoration, Microfiber Inside, Soft and Breathable; Rubber Sole Comfortable foot feeling, Better Wear Resistance and Slip Resistance, Adjustable Straps for Better Fitting. Extra Crystal and Heel Tips can be replaced without Worrying about Accidental Loss of Rhinestones.
HEEL HEIGHT: 1.18"/3.0 cm Causal Enough to Make Your Leg Comfortable and Thinner, Properly Avoiding Twisting Ankle.

Handmade Craftsmanship with Ergonomically Designed. The Upper and Sole are made of Comfortable Material, making you foot more comfortable. Besides, the Leaf Shaped Design and Rhinestone Decoration make the Shoes More Gorgeous. The Design gives you a Trendy and Chic Look.
OCCASION: Special Shoes are Highly Perfect for Wedding, Evening Party, Prom, Cocktail Party, Club, Homecoming, Graduation and any other Special Occasions.

SIZE SELECTION: Because of the conversion issue between the EU and US size, we have provided Our Size Chart Guide located on the left of the product image according to our customer size fitting experience, if you have any questions, please feel free to contact us.
description: Unicoratha aims to provide high-quality crystal/diamante shoes and also services for all members of the public.  These gorgeous shoes are luxuriously created with quality materials and embellished with beautiful rhinestones.  With these new fashion shoes with Bohemian style, you will definitely love your summer show.  Please use our own Size Chart guide located on the left of the product image do not use the Amazon size guide and choose the proper size based on your waist size.
